QuestData.Title: Wrangling a Wolf
QuestData.Description: The wolves of this land have jaws of steel. It is no wonder that the orcs have taken them as their own.$B$BYet, deep in Nagrand, there are young wolves, ripe for taming. They will present a great challenge to you, as they are more fast and agile than any beast in this land.$B$BHere is your final rope, may luck be with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Wolf Lasso on a Young Snarler and follow it until it is tamed.
